text: @Acyn Dumb F*ck, @TomCottonAR, Secretive Chinese Superlab in Wuhan may be responsible for the #coronavirus.  BUT...BUT we have the same labs in America working LARGELY on preventative measures.  LARGELY???? WTF are you saying, you dumb f*cking redneck?
